"-This provides you with emergency alerts, such as evacuation instructions in case of natural disasters
-Emergency alert messages is a public safety service provided as a collaboration between the National Emergency Management Agency, service providers, and mobile device manufacturers. You may not receive messages if there is a problem with your device or if network conditions are poor."

Messages that contain %s will be reported as spam.
%s will be registered as a spam number.
Numbers starting with %s will be registered as spam numbers.
Numbers ending with %s will be registered as spam numbers.
Numbers including %s will be registered as spam numbers.
Numbers starting with %s cannot be registered as spam.
Number must be at least 3 digits.
Words must be at least 4 characters (2 Korean characters).
Words must be at least 4 characters (2 Chinese characters).
Words must be at least %d characters.
Add numbers you want to register as spam.

"Write a recipient's name after the command to jump to the messaging composer."

Write a message after the command to send %s a message.
En fonction des options de votre abonnement, les fonctionnalités SMS et MMS peuvent être désactivées. Merci de bien vouloir vérifier avec votre opérateur.
Would you like to receive all emergency alerts in the future?
If not, you may set the alert types you want to receive in the Messaging > Settings > Emergency alert.
Emergency alerts can be disabled from the alert message.
You can talk with recipients who have enabled the Group messages function. Messages will be sent as MMS messages.

Mobile networks are currently blocked. To use mobile networks, contact the customer service center.
Tap More to view the full text of truncated messages.
URLs received in messages will be active links. This may expose you to phishing scams.

Following unknown URL links leaves your device and personal data vulnerable. By tapping OK, you agree that you are solely responsible for any damage to your device or loss of data that may result from following this link.
Unable to create message or save draft. Memory full. Delete some files or applications.
By setting %s as your default messaging app, you can enjoy all the messaging features that your apps have to offer.
Tap %1$s to set %2$s as your default messaging app.
To change default messaging app, go to Settings > More networks > Default messaging app.
To change default messaging app, go to %s
Tap here to set %s as your default messaging app.

In your current input mode, special characters, such as emoticons and letters with diacritics, may not be shown correctly on the recipient device. To resolve this, go to %s, and set the input mode to Automatic.
No contacts added. %d contacts already exist on the list.
Unable to add priority senders. Maximum number of priority senders (%d) reached.
The maximum number of priority senders (%d) has been reached.
This application is requesting permission to access the items below. Allow?
The device will use data through the currently connected WLAN network.
Not all location sources are currently enabled. For faster and more accurate location detection, enable GPS location settings
This service is provided by Tencent Mobile Phone Manager.
Smart block automatically blocks messages that may be fraudulent, or contain advertising spam. To filter messages containing spam phrases, enable smart block.
Call block list full. Delete some items
Add numbers that will be blocked when they send you a message.
Add phrases that will cause messages to be blocked.
This number will be added to your spam numbers.
The number has been removed from spam numbers.
Delay the sending of your messages so that they can be canceled if needed. The cancel button will be shown for a specified time after you tap Send.
You have selected a sound & shot file. Sound data is not supported for MMS so only the picture will be attached.
Change the input mode to Automatic by going to Settings > Messages > Text messages > Input mode.
The maximum number of characters (%d) has been exceeded.
Receive notifications when applications with the authority to send or receive messages are installed to prevent phishing.
Allow links in messages to be followed.
This application is authorised to access Messages. Tap OK to manage the authorization settings.
Bring the device close to your ear to call this contact.
Failed to report number as spam number.
This number will be reported as a spam number and will be added to Spam numbers.

"Easy report service for mobile spam is only for the report mobile spam, so this must not be used any other purposes. When you report spam, it is received at Korea Spam Response Center(KSRC) of Korea Internet and Security Agency(KISA), and the report includes the items below : sending number, callback number, received time, reported time, title, contents and mobile number of reporter, etc. These items can be used for an investigation, administrative disposition, refusal of reception. According to the case, these can be provided to the proper organizations, but these items shouldn't be provided to any other organizations in the case of refusal of reception. If you want to check the reports, you can find them on the website of KSRC(www.spamcop.or.kr). And if you have any other questions, please call (without prefix number) 118 or access the website. Thank you."
SIM card is not inserted or cannot store SMS messages.
Failed to copy your messages to your SIM card. Tap OK to try again.
